description: Demolition of existing buildings. Erection of a four-storey building to provide new secondary school and sixth form college, (9,825 sqm floorspace, Use Class D1),  a new three-storey community building (2,230 sqm floorspace, 20 rooms) and two residential blocks (part five and six storey buildings) to provide 102 residential flats (approx 9,089 sqm floorspace) and two town houses (three and two storey respectively) together with basement car parking (63 spaces) and 257 cycle spaces provision, associated landscaping and two new vehicle access ways.
